Worked wonderfully! Product key worked as well! Just a quick question, will we have to download a new version every month or can we upgrade with automatic updates? Thanks!

@Marluxia1
No, you only need to go to
Start > All programs > Microsoft Update

When you click in there, microsoft will look for any updates for windows.

It works for me :) U SUCK

Various reasons why it could have failed...
- You probably extratced the files form the .iso and just putted them on the CD.
- You burned the .iso into the CD with a fast speed, making it skip some parts.
- The CDs could just be bad.
